content.text: 0) Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with cold water.
1) Bring water to a boil and immediately remove from heat.
2) Cover and let eggs stand in hot water for 10 to 12 minutes.
3) Remove from hot water, cool, peel and chop finely.
4) In a mixing bowl, combine tuna, crabmeat, mayonnaise, sour cream and mustard.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "combine"@21:28 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "tuna"@29:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "crabmeat"@35:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "mayonnaise"@45:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "sour cream"@57:67 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "mustard"@72:79 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "a mixing bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Stir in chopped egg, dill weed, lemon pepper, dill and sweet relish and chopped onion.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "chopped egg"@11:22 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "dill weed"@24:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "lemon pepper"@35:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "dill and sweet relish"@49:70 / FOOD 
			:ref ing-8
			:ref ing-9)
		:ppt ( ing-10 "chopped onion"@75:88 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
